episodes.title: Leaving the Mormon Cult, Confronting ICE, and Why MAGA Is a Religion
episodes.description:
Leaving the Mormon Cult, Confronting ICE, and Why MAGA Is a Religion

Hawk sits down with Chelsea Gods, a San Diego-based TikTok creator who has built a massive following by walking up to off-duty ICE agents outside the federal courthouse and verbally confronting them on camera. What started as a lighthearted way to make content quickly became something much bigger once the videos went viral across every platform on the internet.

The conversation covers the real mechanics behind how Chelsea finds these agents, what the interactions actually look like up close, and why she keeps doing it even after DHS police tried to stop her on the street. She talks about the night cops came out in full gear and she ran toward them instead of away, and what happened next.

From there, the talk turns to the killing of Renee Good in Minneapolis, the ICE agent identified as the shooter, the lies that came straight out of the Trump administration in the hours after, and a 2014 DHS memo that already laid out exactly why what happened should never have been allowed to happen.

Chelsea and Hawk get into the psychology behind the MAGA movement, including theories on CTE, lead poisoning, and repressed identity driving support for Donald Trump. Chelsea shares what it was like growing up Mormon in Salt Lake City, the questions she started asking at 15 that got her in trouble with church leaders, and how she eventually deconverted her entire family over the course of a decade.

The two also talk about the Epstein files, the way conservative women on the right have publicly defended predatory behavior toward minors, anti-intellectualism rooted in religion, and what it actually feels like to carry out the kind of activism Chelsea does every single day while knowing the risks involved.

#ChelseaGods #Gods #Hawk #HawkPodcast #ICEAgents #ICE #TrumpAdministration #Trump #ReneeGood #JDVance #NickShirley #CaitlynBennett #StephenMiller #Mormonism #Mormon #DHS #Immigration #PoliticalSatire #AntiIntellectialism #Democracy #MAGA #Epstein #CurrentEvents #TikTok #Activism

Timestamps
00:01 Chelsea Gods is introduced and the podcast kicks off with context on the episode recording timeline
02:05 Chelsea talks about how she started confronting off-duty ICE agents at the San Diego federal courthouse
04:31 She walks through exactly how she finds the agents and what happens during the confrontations
09:00 Chelsea reveals that DHS police came after her and describes the face-off that followed
12:08 The killing of Renee Good in Minneapolis and the Trump administration's response come up
13:39 The 2014 DHS memo that already warned against the exact scenario that led to the shooting is brought up
19:11 Chelsea lays out her theories on why Trump supporters behave the way they do
25:14 Chelsea opens up about growing up in the Mormon church and the questions that led her to leave
36:08 The conversation shifts to anti-intellectualism, education, and how religion fuels it
46:22 Hawk and Chelsea talk about Nick Shirley, Caitlyn Bennett, and their roles in Trump-era propaganda
51:00 Chelsea addresses whether she plans to keep confronting ICE agents after the violence in Minneapolis
